entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
